amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the funding for missile defense by $75 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funding for missile defense by $75 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 268 (Roll no. 477).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
